@page "/toolbar/alignment"

@using Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations

@*Hidden:Lines*@
@inherits SampleBaseComponent
@inject NavigationManager NavigationManager


@*End:Hidden*@

<SampleDescription>
    <p> This sample demonstrates how to align the <code>Blazor Toolbar</code> commands in the left, right and center positions.</p>
</SampleDescription>
<ActionDescription>
    <p>The <strong>Blazor Toolbar</strong> commands can be aligned each toolbar item using <strong>Spacer</strong> item type.</p><br />
</ActionDescription>

<div class="col-lg-12 control-section">
    <SfToolbar>
        <ToolbarItems>
            <ToolbarItem PrefixIcon="e-tbar-menu-icon tb-icons" TooltipText="Menu"></ToolbarItem>
            <ToolbarItem Type=ItemType.Spacer></ToolbarItem>
            <ToolbarItem>
                <Template>
                    <div class="e-folder">
                        <div class="e-folder-name">Inbox(33)</div>
                        <div class="e-mail-id">user@example.com</div>
                    </div>
                </Template>
            </ToolbarItem>
            <ToolbarItem Type=ItemType.Spacer></ToolbarItem>
            <ToolbarItem PrefixIcon="e-tbar-search-icon tb-icons" TooltipText="Search">
            </ToolbarItem>
            <ToolbarItem PrefixIcon="e-tbar-settings-icon tb-icons" TooltipText="Popup">
            </ToolbarItem>
        </ToolbarItems>
    </SfToolbar>
    <div class="e-mail-items">
        <div class="e-mail-item">
            <div class="e-mail-image">
                <div class="e-def-avator"><span>MA</span></div>
            </div>
            <div class="e-mail-content">
                <span class="e-mail-header">Maria Anders</span><span class="e-mail-time"
                    style="float: right">11:27 AM</span>
                <div class="e-mail-subject"> Sales Representative </div>
                <div class="e-mail-description"> Can we schedule a meeting appointment for today? </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="e-mail-item">
            <div class="e-mail-image">
                <div class="e-def-avator"><span>VA</span></div>
            </div>
            <div class="e-mail-content">
                <span class="e-mail-header">Victoria Ashworth</span><span class="e-mail-time" style="float: right">Fri
                    7:50 AM</span>
                <div class="e-mail-subject"> Sales Representative </div>
                <div class="e-mail-description"> Yes, we are available for the meeting tomorrow. </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="e-mail-item">
            <div class="e-mail-image">
                <div class="e-def-avator"><span>TH</span></div>
            </div>
            <div class="e-mail-content">
                <span class="e-mail-header">Thomas Hardey</span><span class="e-mail-time" style="float: right">Fri
                    7:50 AM</span>
                <div class="e-mail-subject"> Sales Representative </div>
                <div class="e-mail-description">The customer has accepted our proposal. Would it be possible to arrange a meeting tomorrow? </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


<style>
    @@font-face {
        font-family: 'Material_toolbar';
        src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-tbar-btn .tb-icons {
        font-family: 'Material_toolbar';
        speak: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-variant: normal;
        text-transform: none;
    }

    .e-tbar-menu-icon:before {
        content: "\e718";
    }

    .e-tbar-search-icon:before {
        content: "\e71d";
    }

    .e-tbar-settings-icon:before {
        content: "\e702";
    }

    .e-def-avator {
        margin: 8px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        width: 40px;
        font-size: 20px;
        border: 2px solid #666;
    }

    .e-def-avator span {
        text-align: center;
        line-height: 40px;
        display: block;
    }

    .e-mail-header,
    .e-mail-subject,
    .e-mail-description,
    .e-mail-id {
        white-space: nowrap;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
    }

    .e-folder {
        text-align: center;
    }

    .e-mail-header,
    .e-mail-subject,
    .e-folder {
        font-weight: 500;
        font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-mail-item {
        margin-top: 8px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #d3d3d3;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .e-mail-image {
        margin-right: 10px;
        float: left;
        height: 60px;
    }
</style>
